verses.verse: The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5265>traveled,<s%> and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in the <S%H6160>plains<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> at <S%H3405>Jericho.<s%>
<S%H1111>Balak<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6834>Zippor<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> all that <S%H3478>Israel<s%> had <S%H6213>done<s%> to the <S%H567>Amorites.<s%>

<S%H4124>Moab<s%> was <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H1481>afraid<s%> <S%H6440>of<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> because they were <S%H7227>many:<s%> and <S%H4124>Moab<s%> was <S%H6973>distressed<s%> because <S%H6440>of<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

<S%H4124>Moab<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian,<s%> "Now this <S%H6951>multitude<s%> will lick <S%H3897>up<s%> all that is <S%H5439>around<s%> <S%H7794>us,<s%> as the ox licks <S%H3897>up<s%> the <S%H3418>grass<s%> of the <S%H7704>field.<s%>" <S%H1111>Balak<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6834>Zippor<s%> was <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> at that <S%H6256>time.<s%>

He <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> to <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1160>Beor,<s%> to <S%H6604>Pethor,<s%> which is by the <S%H5104>River,<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of his <S%H5971>people,<s%> to <S%H7121>call<s%> <S%H559>him,<s%> saying, <S%H5971>"Behold,<s%> there is a people who came <S%H3318>out<s%> from <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%> <S%H3680>Behold,<s%> they cover the <S%H5869>surface<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and they are <S%H3427>staying<s%> opposite <S%H4136>me.<s%>

Please <S%H3212>come<s%> now therefore <S%H779>curse<s%> me this <S%H5971>people;<s%> for they are too <S%H6099>mighty<s%> for <S%H3201>me:<s%> perhaps I shall prevail, that we may <S%H5221>strike<s%> <S%H1644>them,<s%> and that I may drive them out of the <S%H776>land;<s%> for I <S%H3045>know<s%> that he whom you <S%H1288>bless<s%> is <S%H1288>blessed,<s%> and he whom you <S%H779>curse<s%> is <S%H779>cursed.<s%>"

The <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> and the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian<s%> <S%H3212>departed<s%> with the rewards of <S%H7081>divination<s%> in their <S%H3027>hand;<s%> and they <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H1109>Balaam,<s%> and <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to him the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H1111>Balak.<s%>

He <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3885>them,<s%> "Lodge here this <S%H3915>night,<s%> and I will <S%H7725>bring<s%> you <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H7725>again,<s%> as <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> to <S%H8269>me.<s%>" The princes of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> <S%H3427>stayed<s%> with <S%H1109>Balaam.<s%>
<S%H430>God<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H1109>Balaam,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "Who are these men with <S%H582>you?<s%>"
<S%H1109>Balaam<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H1111>"Balak<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6834>Zippor,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> has said to <S%H7971>me,<s%>

<S%H5971><s%> 'Behold, the people that has come <S%H3318>out<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> it <S%H3680>covers<s%> the <S%H5869>surface<s%> of the <S%H776>earth:<s%> <S%H3212>now,<s%> come <S%H6895>curse<s%> me <S%H3201>them;<s%> perhaps I shall be able to fight <S%H3898>against<s%> <S%H1644>them,<s%> and shall drive them out.'"
<S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1109>Balaam,<s%> "You shall not <S%H3212>go<s%> with <S%H779>them.<s%> You shall not curse the <S%H5971>people;<s%> for they are <S%H1288>blessed.<s%>"

<S%H1109>Balaam<s%> rose <S%H6965>up<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H1111>Balak,<s%> <S%H3212>"Go<s%> to your <S%H776>land;<s%> for <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H3985>refuses<s%> to <S%H5414>permit<s%> me to go with <S%H1980>you.<s%>"

The <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> rose <S%H6965>up,<s%> and they <S%H935>went<s%> to <S%H1111>Balak,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1109>"Balaam<s%> <S%H3985>refuses<s%> to come with <S%H1980>us.<s%>"
<S%H1111>Balak<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> yet <S%H3254>again<s%> <S%H8269>princes,<s%> <S%H7227>more,<s%> and more honorable than <S%H3513>they.<s%>

They <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H1109>Balaam,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H559>him,<s%> "Thus says <S%H1111>Balak<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6834>Zippor,<s%> <S%H4513><s%> 'Please let nothing hinder you from coming to <S%H1980>me:<s%>

for I will <S%H3513>promote<s%> you to <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H3513>great<s%> <S%H3513>honor,<s%> and whatever you <S%H559>say<s%> to me I will <S%H6213>do.<s%> Please <S%H3212>come<s%> <S%H6895>therefore,<s%> and curse this people for <S%H5971>me.<s%>'"

<S%H1109>Balaam<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> the <S%H5650>servants<s%> of <S%H1111>Balak,<s%> "If <S%H1111>Balak<s%> would <S%H5414>give<s%> me his <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H4393>full<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%> and <S%H2091>gold,<s%> I <S%H3201>can't<s%> go <S%H5674>beyond<s%> the <S%H6310>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> my <S%H430>God,<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H6996>less<s%> or <S%H1419>more.<s%>
Now <S%H3427>therefore,<s%> please wait also here this <S%H3915>night,<s%> that I may <S%H3045>know<s%> what <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will <S%H1696>speak<s%> to me <S%H3254>more.<s%>"

<S%H430>God<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> at <S%H3915>night,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H582>him,<s%> "If the men have <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H7121>call<s%> <S%H6965>you,<s%> rise up, <S%H3212>go<s%> with <S%H389>them;<s%> but only the <S%H1697>word<s%> which I <S%H1696>speak<s%> to <S%H6213>you,<s%> that you shall do."
<S%H1109>Balaam<s%> rose <S%H6965>up<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and <S%H2280>saddled<s%> his <S%H860>donkey,<s%> and <S%H3212>went<s%> with the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab.<s%>

<S%H430>God<s%>'s <S%H639>anger<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled<s%> because he <S%H1980>went;<s%> and the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H3320>placed<s%> himself in the <S%H1870>way<s%> for an <S%H7854>adversary<s%> against <S%H7392>him.<s%> Now he was riding on his <S%H860>donkey,<s%> and his <S%H8147>two<s%> servants were with <S%H5288>him.<s%>

The <S%H860>donkey<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5324>standing<s%> in the <S%H1870>way,<s%> with his <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H8025>drawn<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand;<s%> and the <S%H860>donkey<s%> turned <S%H5186>aside<s%> out of the <S%H1870>way,<s%> and <S%H3212>went<s%> into the <S%H7704>field:<s%> and <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> <S%H5221>struck<s%> the <S%H860>donkey,<s%> to <S%H5186>turn<s%> her into the <S%H1870>way.<s%>

Then the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> in a narrow <S%H4934>path<s%> between the <S%H3754>vineyards,<s%> a <S%H1447>wall<s%> being on this <S%H1447>side,<s%> and a wall on that side.

The <S%H860>donkey<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and she <S%H3905>thrust<s%> herself to the <S%H7023>wall,<s%> and <S%H3905>crushed<s%> <S%H1109>Balaam<s%>'s <S%H7272>foot<s%> against the <S%H7023>wall:<s%> and he <S%H5221>struck<s%> her <S%H3254>again.<s%>

The <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5674>went<s%> <S%H3254>further,<s%> and <S%H5975>stood<s%> in a <S%H6862>narrow<s%> <S%H4725>place,<s%> where there was no <S%H1870>way<s%> to <S%H5186>turn<s%> either to the right <S%H3225>hand<s%> or to the <S%H8040>left.<s%>

The <S%H860>donkey<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and she lay <S%H7257>down<s%> under <S%H1109>Balaam:<s%> and <S%H1109>Balaam<s%>'s <S%H639>anger<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled,<s%> and he <S%H5221>struck<s%> the <S%H860>donkey<s%> with his <S%H4731>staff.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6605>opened<s%> the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H860>donkey,<s%> and she <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1109>Balaam,<s%> "What have I <S%H6213>done<s%> to <S%H5221>you,<s%> that you have struck me these <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H7272>times?<s%>"

<S%H1109>Balaam<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H860>donkey,<s%> "Because you have <S%H5953>mocked<s%> <S%H3863>me,<s%> I wish there <S%H3426>were<s%> a <S%H2719>sword<s%> in my <S%H3027>hand,<s%> for now I would have killed <S%H2026>you.<s%>"

The <S%H860>donkey<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1109>Balaam,<s%> "Am I not your <S%H860>donkey,<s%> on which you have <S%H7392>ridden<s%> all your life long to this <S%H3117>day?<s%> Was I <S%H5532>ever<s%> in the <S%H5532>habit<s%> of doing <S%H6213>so<s%> to <S%H559>you?<s%>" He said, "No."

Then <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1540>opened<s%> the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of <S%H1109>Balaam,<s%> and he <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5324>standing<s%> in the <S%H1870>way,<s%> with his <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H8025>drawn<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand;<s%> and he <S%H6915>bowed<s%> his <S%H7812>head,<s%> and fell on his <S%H639>face.<s%>

The <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H5221>him,<s%> "Why have you struck your <S%H860>donkey<s%> these <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H7272>times?<s%> <S%H3318>Behold,<s%> I have come forth as an <S%H7854>adversary,<s%> because your <S%H1870>way<s%> is perverse before <S%H3399>me:<s%>

and the <S%H860>donkey<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H5186>me,<s%> and turned aside before <S%H6440>me<s%> these <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H7272>times.<s%> <S%H194>Unless<s%> she had <S%H5186>turned<s%> aside from <S%H6440>me,<s%> surely now I would have <S%H2026>killed<s%> <S%H2421>you,<s%> and saved her alive."

<S%H1109>Balaam<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> "I have <S%H2398>sinned;<s%> for I <S%H3045>didn't<s%> know that you <S%H5324>stood<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H7125>against<s%> <S%H7489>me.<s%> Now therefore, if it displeases you, I will go back <S%H7725>again.<s%>"

The <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1109>Balaam,<s%> <S%H3212>"Go<s%> with the <S%H582>men;<s%> but <S%H657>only<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> that I shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> to <S%H1696>you,<s%> that you shall speak." So <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> with the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H1111>Balak.<s%>

When <S%H1111>Balak<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> that <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> had <S%H935>come,<s%> he went <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> him to the <S%H5892>City<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> which is on the <S%H1366>border<s%> of the <S%H769>Arnon,<s%> which is in the <S%H7097>utmost<s%> part of the <S%H1366>border.<s%>

<S%H1111>Balak<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1109>Balaam,<s%> <S%H7971>"Didn't<s%> I earnestly <S%H7971>send<s%> to you to <S%H7121>call<s%> <S%H1980>you?<s%> Why didn't you come to <S%H3201>me?<s%> Am I not able <S%H552>indeed<s%> to promote you to <S%H3513>honor?<s%>"

<S%H1109>Balaam<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1111>Balak,<s%> <S%H935>"Behold,<s%> I have come to <S%H3201>you:<s%> have I now any power at <S%H3201>all<s%> to <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H3972>anything?<s%> The <S%H1697>word<s%> that <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7760>puts<s%> in my <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> that shall I <S%H1696>speak.<s%>"
<S%H1109>Balaam<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> with <S%H1111>Balak,<s%> and they <S%H935>came<s%> to Kiriath <S%H2351>Huzoth.<s%>
<S%H1111>Balak<s%> <S%H2076>sacrificed<s%> <S%H1241>cattle<s%> and <S%H6629>sheep,<s%> and <S%H7971>sent<s%> to <S%H1109>Balaam,<s%> and to the princes who were with <S%H8269>him.<s%>

It happened in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> that <S%H1111>Balak<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H1109>Balaam,<s%> and brought him <S%H5927>up<s%> into the high <S%H1116>places<s%> of <S%H1120>Baal;<s%> and he <S%H7200>saw<s%> from there the <S%H7097>utmost<s%> part of the <S%H5971>people.<s%>
